thread.title: Kiyomi

author: Kiyomi
title: Kiyomi
text: Being 8 months pregnant, I started thinking about life insurance for the future addition. Unfortunately many insurance companies use your current weight to determine your BMI. Very few women will have healthy BMI's when 8 months pregnant. Cory worked with me to find an insurance company that takes pregnancy into account when doing the health screens. I was able to complete the screening process and get a great rate all within a week. Quotacy definitely simplifies the life insurance process and makes it accessible.
